member.name: SP_DEVICE_INTERFACE_DETAIL_DATA
member.summary: An SP_DEVICE_INTERFACE_DETAIL_DATA structure contains the path for a device interface.

member.name: SP_DEVICE_INTERFACE_DETAIL_DATA.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the SP_DEVICE_INTERFACE_DETAIL_DATA structure. For more information, see the following Remarks section.

member.name: SP_DEVICE_INTERFACE_DETAIL_DATA.DevicePath
member.summary: A NULL-terminated string that contains the device interface path. This path can be passed to Win32 functions such as .
